document_data.name: Maforie Chûmavh
document_data.History:
Maforie lived all her life in slavery to the [[fire giant]] rulers of her city.

As of [[1491 DR]], Maforie was at the entrance to the [[Undying Temple]].{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|37-38}}
document_data.Personality: Unlike most drow females, Maforie was shy and quiet, but still distrustful of others.
document_data.Relationship: Unknown to herself, Maforie was the last heiress of [[House Chûmavh]].
